item.title: Award
item.description: Graybill/Boes Award, 2020 Outstanding graduate student in Statistics demonstrating excellence in linear models and/or exhibiting excellence in high teaching standards Outstanding Graduates of SiChuan University, 2018 Meritorious Winner of Interdisciplinary Contest In Modeling, 2017 Our team built and analyzed a model of urban population growth in cities. Successful Participant of Mathematical Contest In Modeling, 2016 First Class Scholarship of SiChuan University, 2016 Top 5% students

item.title: Experience
item.description: Graduate Research and Teaching Assistant, 2018 - present Department of Statistics, Colorado State University Serve as course instructor for Introduction to Biostatistics (STAT 307) and conduct weekly review sessions in Statistics Success Center Direct weekly recitations for Statistics for Business Students (STAT 204) Grade for Statistics for Design and Data Analysis for Researchers (STAT 511) and Statistical Data Analysis (STAT 341) Member of Orienteering Team, 2014 - 2018
